title: Capture memorable moments this Summer at the NovotelIbis Gate Hotels
text:
(MENAFN Press) Standing 20 floors tall overlooking the Creek and the magnificent Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, both Novotel & Ibis Gate Hotels Abu Dhabi promise to deliver a memorable nice stay for everyone this summer 2015.

Mrs. Nicola Hochgruber, General Manager to both properties, welcomes all guest and visitor to come and enjoy wonderful stays at the Novotel & Ibis Gate Hotels.

"This year, we prepared special offers to everyone, so they can be able to enjoy the wonderful occasion with special competitive rates," Hochgruber said.

Both hotels are conveniently located in the quiet area of Al Maqtaa. The hotels are 15 minutes from downtown and close to all major business hubs and key leisure attraction of Abu Dhabi. 

"We are close to Abu Dhabi Airport, Exhibition Center, Yas Island and the highway to Dubai, the hotels features many innovations like online check-in and Accor Press. The hotels offer charged Airport pick-up, free WIFI, free indoor parking and valet service," added the General Manager.

Summer Promotion:

Novotel Gate Hotel at AED 299* inclusive of breakfast for 2
Ibis Gate Hotel at AED 225* inclusive of breakfast for 2
*Rates are subject to 10% service charge and 6% tourism fee
*Rates are valid to August 31, 2015
